title: Rekindle
description: Melanie McNulty has a great life. She has a wonderful husband, Jim, and a beautiful daughter, Katy, who is celebrating her first birthday. Although Melanie objects, her eccentric mother-in-law, Evelyn, insists on hosting a weekend affair to celebrate Katy’s birthday. Melanie’s world is shattered when Katy’s first birthday turns tragic. Melanie is left feeling alone and plummets into a world of desperation and despair. Her brother-in-law, Rob, a perpetual bachelor known for his carefree lifestyle, becomes determined to help Melanie rebuild her life. As Melanie struggles to come to terms with her loss, her friendship with Rob deepens. When an unexpected twist of fate presents itself, Melanie is forced to reevaluate her feelings for Rob. Melanie’s life is hurled forward and she finds herself torn between the past and the present. She must question her ability to live and love again and is faced with the ultimate choice - hold on to her past or let go and move forward with her future?
author: Donna D'Achillo
